videoSnippet.title: The Man Who Refused the Crown || Akiba Rubinstein vs Karl Schlechter || St. Petersburg 1909
videoSnippet.description:
Download Lotus Chess Here! https://onelink.to/lotus-agadmator 
Search all my videos easy https://agadmator-library.github.io/

Akiba Rubinstein vs Carl Schlechter
St. Petersburg (1909), St. Petersburg RUE, rd 13, Mar-04
Queen's Gambit Declined: Orthodox Defense. Main Line (D67)

1.d4 d5 2.Nf3 e6 3.c4 Nf6 4.Bg5 Be7 5.Nc3 Nbd7 6.e3 c6 7.Bd3 dxc4 8.Bxc4 Nd5 9.Bxe7 Qxe7 10.O-O O-O 11.Rc1 Rd8 12.Qc2 Nf8 13.e4 Nb6 14.Bb3 Bd7 15.Ne2 Be8 16.Rfd1 Rac8 17.Qc3 Rc7 18.Nf4 f6 19.Qa5 g5 20.Ne2 Nc8 21.d5 Rcd7 22.Ned4 cxd5 23.exd5 Rxd5 24.Bxd5 Rxd5 25.Qe1 Nd6 26.Ne2 Bc6 27.Rxd5 Bxd5 28.Nfd4 e5 29.Nc3 Qf7 30.Nxd5 Qxd5
31.Nb3 b6 32.Rd1 Qc6 33.Qc3 Qxc3 34.bxc3 Ne4 35.c4 Kf7 36.Rd8 Ke7 37.Ra8 a5 38.f3 Nc3 39.c5 bxc5 40.Nxc5 Nxa2 41.Ra7+ Ke8 42.Kf2 Nb4 43.Rxa5 Kf7 44.Ke3 h5 45.Ke4 Nc6 46.Ra6 Ne7 47.g4 hxg4 48.fxg4 Kg6 49.Ra7 Kf7 50.Nb7 Kg6 51.Nd6 Nc6 52.Rc7 Nd4 53.Nf5 Nxf5 54.gxf5+ Kh6 55.Kf3 Nh7 56.Kg4 e4 57.Re7 e3 58.Rxe3 Kg7 59.Re7+

0:01 Hello Everyone!
00:05 VAST KNOWLEDGE INCOMING!
08:10 Game Starts!
10:00 Completely New Game
19:15 It Was In This Position
21:50 Legends of the Channel!
